actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to permit secondary mortgage market financing for residential properties that include small day care centers.

summary.text: Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to permit secondary mortgage market financing for residential properties in which community child care services are provided in compliance with applicable State or local law.

titles.title: A bill to permit secondary mortgage market financing for residential properties that include small day care centers.
